name: FIVE DAYS AT CORONA
description:
You are a girl who is working at a hospital "Corona Lab" Level. You are going to take tests all day on different people who is showing up with Covid19... But can YOU stay healthy?

The vaccine will be ready in 5 days...

www.rednapgames.com (Official Web)

(If this game gets over 200 downloads total, I'll make Night 6 with more content!)
